channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: At least 43 dead in catastrophic Texas flooding and dozens missing from girls camp
item.description: Flash flooding slammed the Texas Hill Country overnight on Friday. At least 27 girls from a summer camp next to the Guadalupe River remain missing.

item.title: Suzanne Morphew's body was moved after she was murdered, per indictment
item.description: Husband Barry Morphew rearrested as authorities link him to animal tranquilizers found in wife Suzanne Morphew's bone marrow.

item.title: Colorado man arrested a second time for his wife Suzanne Morphew's murder
item.description: The latest grand jury indictment against Barry Morphew alleges new details that are surprising even to those who've been following the case since his ...

item.title: Wife of murdered beauty exec maintains her innocence
item.description: Monica Sementilli goes on trial for conspiring to murder her celebrity hairdresser husband Fabio Sementilli.

item.title: Texas flood victims: Girl 'living her best life' and 'heart and soul' of camp
item.description: Eight-year-old Renee Smajstrla and "strong and powerful" camp director Jane Ragsdale were swept away.

item.title: A boy saved by barbed wire, a 'destroyed' camp and missed warning signs in Texas floods
item.description: Survivors describe a deluge that pounced with devastating speed in the pre-dawn hours in central Texas.

item.title: Man once charged in missing wife's death: "I've done nothing wrong"
item.description: "They've got too much pride to say they're wrong," Barry Morphew said about authorities in Colorado.

item.title: Elon Musk says he is launching new political party
item.description: The world's richest man says he is setting up a new political organisation called the America Party.

item.title: Australian PM vows 'full force of law' after arson attack at synagogue
item.description: “Antisemitism has no place in Australia,” Anthony Albanese said after the latest in a string of attacks.

item.title: Search for missing continues as Texas floods kill 51, including 15 children
item.description: Hundreds of rescuers search for people missing after flash floods killed 51 people, including 15 children.

item.title: Judge grants motion to dismiss charges in Suzanne Morphew case
item.description: The Colorado mother vanished in May 2020. Her husband, Barry, was about to go on trial for her murder.

item.title: Heat and wildfire smoke affect birth outcomes, according to a new study
item.description: Heat and wildfire smoke affect birth outcomes, according to a new study of women in Los Angeles.

item.title: Cuts to HIV research funding in the US impacts progress towards ending the epidemic
item.description: How will the Trump administration's cuts to HIV research impact the progress that's been made towards ending the epidemic in the U.S.?

item.title: Photos: Texas reels from deadly flooding
item.description: Gov. Greg Abbott says the state will work day and night to find people who may be stranded and unable to call for help.

item.title: Here's a timeline of the catastrophic Texas floods
item.description: NPR has compiled a timeline of when local, state and federal officials posted warnings on social media as well as the timeline of events as presented ...

item.title: Texas floods leave at least 51 dead, 27 girls missing as rescuers search devastated landscape
item.description: Devastating flash floods from a storm that pounded central Texas have killed at least 51 people. Officials say the death toll is 43 and likely to grow...

item.title: Texas officials face scrutiny over response to catastrophic and deadly flooding
Floods turned beloved Texas camp into a nightmare. At least 27 girls remain missing
